text:
Clearcase can work recursivly on a list of files or directories. Currently it 
appears you can only run the ClearCase commands on one file or directory at a 
time. It would be great if you could use the pattern sets that are already 
defined in the build.xml file
creator: pdavidson@bear.com
sbailliez@apache.org
text:
As far as I can see this will require quite some changes to the CC tasks.

- We cannot pass them via commandline to cleartool otherwise we will quickly 
reach the command line limit on some OS

- It will be very slow to fork a process per fileset entry.

The more efficient way to do this is probably to work with a single process of 
cleartool and sending commands to the input.

Alternatively as it is somewhat related, you can take a look at clearfsimport 
which is an unsupported tool in CC 4.1 but shipped with CC 4.2
